0/4 (vert - D3D12): basic

0/4 (frag - D3D12): basic

0/4 (frag - Vulkan): basic





0/4 (vert - Metal): basic

0/4 (frag - Metal): basic

1/4 (frag - D3D12): plane

1/4 (frag - Vulkan): plane

1/4 (frag - Metal): plane

2/4 (frag - D3D12): skinning
